entry.content: Scoop bucket for open source/freeware games and game-related tools

entry.title: https://github.com/ChrisTitusTech/winutil
entry.content: Chris Titus Tech's Windows Utility - Install Programs, Tweaks, Fixes, and Updates

entry.title: https://github.com/LeDragoX/Win-Debloat-Tools
entry.content: Re-imagining Windows like a minimal OS install, already debloated with minimal impact for most functionality.

entry.title: https://github.com/Raphire/Win11Debloat
entry.content: A simple, easy to use PowerShell script to remove pre-installed apps from Windows, disable telemetry, remove Bing from Windows search as well as perform various other changes to declutter and improve your Windows experience. This script works for both Windows 10 and Windows 11.

entry.title: https://github.com/dartraiden/NVIDIA-patcher
entry.content: Adds 3D acceleration support for P106-090 / P106-100 / P104-100 / P104-101 / P102-100 / CMP 30HX / CMP 40HX / CMP 50HX / CMP 70HX / CMP 90HX / CMP 170HX mining cards as well as RTX 3060 3840SP, RTX 3080 Ti 20 GB, RTX 4070 10 GB, and L40 ES.

entry.title: https://github.com/debridmediamanager/zurg-testing
entry.content: A self-hosted Real-Debrid webdav server you can use with Infuse. Together with rclone it can mount your Real-Debrid torrent library into your filesystem and load it to Plex or Jellyfin.

entry.title: https://github.com/jeppevinkel/jellyfin-tizen-builds
entry.content: The purpose of this repository is to automatically build the most up-to-date version of jellyfin-tizen.

entry.title: https://github.com/mandiant/commando-vm
entry.content: Complete Mandiant Offensive VM (Commando VM), a fully customizable Windows-based pentesting virtual machine distribution. commandovm@mandiant.com

entry.title: https://github.com/meetrevision/playbook
entry.content: A lightweight, stable, and performance-focused customized version of Windows that enhances privacy and compatibility

entry.title: https://github.com/microsoft/undocked
entry.content: Simplifies the process of building internal, native Windows projects
